Для Andrew Old каждый день — это шанс от: For Andrew Old, every day is a chance to discover something new, be it people, places or ideas. The most important thing in life is to travel, communicate and draw inspiration from every experience. Life is about taste, energy and creativity that you want to share with the world.

это музыка с душой и смыслом. Его треки: this is music with soul and meaning. His tracks are stories from life, a little sadness, a little humor and always honesty. In songs, it is important for him that each verse speaks for itself and leaves a mark on the listener's heart.
Это история, где всё началось с увлечени: It’s a story where it all started with a passion for hip-hop and rap, growing up on the music of the greats of the 90s and 2000s, such as 2Pac, Wu-Tang Clan, Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg. These artists set the style, inspired the first lines and the first attempts at recording in a home studio. Opening up to music, he took up learning English, because understanding lyrics and culture became an important part of his growth. Later, life prompted him to travel - working in the UAE and China not only expanded his horizons, but also added new meanings and sounds to his work.
Добро пожаловать на поэтическую страницу: Welcome to Andrew Old's poetry page! Here are lines that speak to everything from joy to pain, from simple moments to profound thoughts. For Andrew Old, poetry is a way to stop a moment, feel it, and share it with you. Open any poem, and perhaps it will resonate with you in some way.
Семья всегда была основой жизни Andrew O: Family has always been the foundation of Andrew Old's life. His father is an example of strength and hard work, and his mother is a source of care and inspiration that shaped his worldview. His older brother became his first mentor and support in his youth, and his younger brother was a close friend with whom he shared not only the joys but also the challenges of life. These relationships became the support for Andrew Old, defining his path and the values that guided him in life.
Для Andrew Old дружба не знает языковых: For Andrew Old, friendship knows no linguistic or social boundaries. His friends have always noted the openness, kindness and respect with which he treats everyone. As he travels the world, he has found like-minded people, creating warm and trusting bonds that have stayed with him for many years. This approach to life, based on simplicity and honesty, reflects his deep belief that true friendship knows no boundaries.
был не прямым и не однозначным. Это был: was not direct and not unambiguous. It was a search for one's place in life
Конечно же как и всех путь Andrew Old на: Of course, like everyone else, Andrew Old's path began with his birth - on February 8, 1985, in the wonderful city of Kyiv, fed by the energy of the ancient Dnieper River and bathed in the greenery of trees. For the family, it was a time of worries, hopes and the struggle for happiness. They had to survive the birth of a younger brother, the Chernobyl tragedy, the difficult 90s. And Andrew Old looked at everything and everyone around him with interest, absorbed it. However, he was in no hurry to express his opinion - the time had not yet come.
Andrew Old попробовал себя в разных вида: Andrew Old tried himself in different types of work - from a courier to a mechanic. He took on everything with interest, but quickly realized that working with his hands was not quite his strong point. Although there was one exception - during his studies at the institute, he had to work for a long time as a dough mixer and baker. At the same time, the first stage name "MC Baker" was born, since the first songs and first performances at open microphones had already appeared.
1990-е годы на всех наложили отпечаток с: The 1990s left their mark on everyone with their severity and the need to stand up for themselves. Perhaps because of this and also because there were many African-Americans among successful boxers, Andrew Old became interested in amateur boxing. He was happy boxing for himself, despite the damage to his nose and ears. Another important sporting hobby was bodybuilding. He did it with pleasure and desire.
Школа в 90-х для Andrew Old как и для мн: School in the 90s was a turbulent place for Andrew Old, as it was for many others. Material, cultural and ideological inequality brought children together in this seething cauldron of hormones and aspirations. Nevertheless, it was at school that Andrew Old developed into a person who knew a lot about life principles, humor and a careful attitude towards things.
Определяющей вехой в жизни и работе Andr: The defining milestone in Andrew Old's life and work was his work in the hotel services industry. His first experience and first mistakes were made at the Slavutich Hotel. Perseverance, persistence and aspiration for development soon allowed Andrew Old to join the friendly team of the Hyatt Regency Kyiv Hotel. His work there left behind many wonderful and funny memories, the former of which evoke warm, joyful feelings, while the latter evoke a smile or awkwardness. These were wonderful years of learning human qualities, feelings, characters... Excellent English practice and many grateful clients of the Hyatt Regency Kyiv. The hotel management offered Andrew Old a promotion many times, but he was not ready to accept the responsibility of working with subordinates, and his further career as a hallway attendant did not provide significant growth. It was time for a change...

Спустя год после школы Andrew Old еще не: A year after school, Andrew Old still didn't know what he wanted to do. Several temporary jobs didn't catch on and it became clear that he needed an education. It's hard to say why he chose this, but in 2003 he enrolled in the International Economics major at the Kyiv Institute of International Economics and Entrepreneurship. He received his bachelor's degree in 2007.
Уже наметились первые интересы Andrew Ol: Andrew Old's first interests had already emerged. He began to communicate a lot with different people - it was a fascinating process. There were a lot of jokes and humor - Andrew Old always found a lot of funny and hilarious things in life. The first audio cassettes with recordings of 2Pac, Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem appeared... The realization came that in order to fully immerse himself in the element of rap, it was necessary to thoroughly know the English language
В 2016 году Andrew Old принял смелое реш: In 2016, Andrew Old made a bold decision to travel to Abu Dhabi to work in one of the local hotels. This trip marked the beginning of a new stage in his life, full of unforgettable impressions and challenges. Finding himself in a city where the sun is always shining and the temperature rarely drops below 40 degrees, he quickly got used to the idea that air conditioning is not a luxury, but a necessity. But beyond the heat, an amazing world opened up: people from different countries, cultures and religions, each with their own history and unique experiences.
Работа в международной команде стала для: Working in an international team was not only a professional challenge for Andrew, but also a chance to learn how to find a common language with people whose views and approaches to life were sometimes completely different. Every day was an opportunity to learn something new, whether it was the specifics of working in the hospitality industry or just talking over a cup of coffee with colleagues who soon became his friends. This experience not only enriched his inner world, but also gave him moments that he kept as special memories of his life in hot and hospitable Abu Dhabi.

Постоянное движение вперед, новый опыт,: Constant movement forward, new experience, new impressions - this is what caused Andrew Old to need to develop and not sit still. He already has experience behind him and is full of energy. There is something to share with other people and a desire to travel. Isn't this a reason to move to China for a while after a short vacation at home?
Пришло время Andrew Old отправиться повы: It was time for Andrew Old to go abroad to improve his qualifications. Quite a few CVs were sent and online interviews were completed. And finally, tickets were bought and luggage was packed - the destination is one of the beautiful emirates of the UAE - Abu Dhabi.
После работы в Абу-Даби Andrew Old понял: After working in Abu Dhabi, Andrew Old realized that his knowledge of English had become a solid foundation for a new stage. Gradually, he began to wonder how to pass on his skills to others who were just beginning to master this language. This process captivated him - to find an approach to different people, to see their progress and to share his experience. He took his first steps in teaching online, where his first students appeared, for whom he became not just a teacher, but also a mentor.
Вскоре Andrew узнал о высоком спросе на: Andrew soon learned of the high demand for English teachers in China, especially to work with children. This idea sparked a desire in him to move forward. In 2019, he traveled to Beijing to try his hand at teaching English to children. This decision became a major turning point in his life, opening a new direction and providing an experience that enriched him as a professional and a person.
Работа с детьми в Китае открыла для Andr: Working with children in China opened up a whole new world of experiences for Andrew Old. He found creative ways to make learning fun and engaging: games, songs and interactive activities helped children learn English with pleasure. Seeing the joy and interest in the eyes of his students was a real inspiration for him. Each lesson was not only about language, but also about friendship, laughter and discovering a new world.
Однако жизнь вдали от дома оказалась неп: However, life away from home was not easy. Organizing everyday life in a foreign country, where the language and culture are so different, required a lot of effort. There were months when the longing for home and family was especially noticeable. But this experience toughened him up, taught him to overcome difficulties and find a balance between work and personal life. It was these trials that made him stronger and left a bright mark on his life.
